channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware Tanzu -- VMware GemFire
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware Tanzu -- VMware GemFire

item.title: CVE-2019-11286|2024-08-04T22:48:09.058Z -- vmware%20tanzu -- vmware%20gemfire
item.description: VMware GemFire versions prior to 9.10.0, 9.9.1, 9.8.5, and 9.7.5, and VMware Tanzu GemFire for VMs versions prior to 1.11.0, 1.10.1, 1.9.2, and 1.8.2, contain a JMX service available to the network which does not properly restrict input. A remote authenticated malicious user may request against the service with a crafted set of credentials leading to remote code execution.
